summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the refactored ApproachesPage. All 15 approach tabs render correctly with proper content. Search functionality, collapsible sections, weight/age inputs with calculated values, and Vital Signs Reference card all work as expected. Mobile viewport meta tags are correctly configured for GoDaddy domain responsiveness.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: Login flow works correctly with test credentials
Navigation to Approaches page via ER/Pediatric Ward -> Approaches
All 15 tabs found: sepsis, seizure, asthma, tbi, dka, adrenal, anaphylaxis, thrombocytopenia, hypocalcemia, dloc, headache, weakness, gait, hyperkalemia, ugib
Search 'hyperkalemia' correctly filters to show only Hyperkalemia tab
Calculated fluid bolus (400 mL for 20kg) displayed in Sepsis tab
Min SBP calculation (80 mmHg for 5y) displayed in Vital Signs Reference
Collapsible sections toggle correctly on click
Vital Signs Reference card expands/collapses correctly
Vital Signs table displays with Age, HR, RR, SBP, Wt(kg) columns
All 15 approach tabs render their respective content with expected keywords
Viewport meta tag correctly set: width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=5.0, user-scalable=yes
Mobile web app capable meta tag: yes
Apple mobile web app capable meta tag: yes
action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent in Medical Disclaimer modal for accessibility
critical_code_review_comments: Refactoring successful: ApproachesPage.jsx reduced from 2700+ lines to 347 lines
All 15 approach components properly extracted to /approaches/ directory
Shared Section component used consistently across all approach components
data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Mobile viewport meta tags correctly configured in index.html
Weight-based calculations work correctly in approach components
context_for_next_testing_agent: ApproachesPage refactoring is complete and working. All 15 approach tabs (Sepsis, Seizure, Asthma, TBI, DKA, Adrenal, Anaphylaxis, Thrombocytopenia, Hypocalcemia, DLOC, Headache, Weakness, Gait, Hyperkalemia, UGIB) render correctly. Search functionality filters tabs by keywords. Weight/age inputs display calculated values in approach components. Vital Signs Reference card toggles correctly. Mobile viewport meta tags are properly configured for GoDaddy domain responsiveness.
